about_the_game:
Welcome to the new expansion for Parking Tycoon Business Simulator, where you'll immerse yourself in the atmosphere of sunny and vibrant Miami's waterfront district! This is your chance to build and manage your parking business in one of America's most popular coastal cities.

Expansion Features:

🌴 Seaside District:
Discover scenic streets bathed in sunlight and breathtaking ocean views. Explore new levels and challenges that come with the unique atmosphere of this district.



🏄 Surfboard Rental Shop:
Become a part of the local surfing community by opening your own surfboard rental shop. Attract tourists and locals alike by providing them with top-notch equipment for unforgettable surfing adventures.



🅿️ High-Tech Multi-Level Rotary Parking:
Introducing the next generation of parking systems! Construct high-tech multi-level rotary parking that allows you to efficiently utilize space and cater to the needs of all drivers.

Join us in Parking Tycoon Business Simulator: Seaside Business and show everyone that you can build a thriving parking business in the heart of sunny Miami!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Win 10
  • Processor: i3
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Win 10
  • Processor: i5
  • Graphics: GTX 1060

short_description: Dive into Miami’s vibrant Seaside District in the expansion for Parking Tycoon Business Simulator! Enjoy stunning ocean views, manage a surfboard rental shop, and implement high-tech parking solutions. Build your empire and become the parking tycoon of the sunny waterfront!
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
